summary: MY CAR HIT A TRUCK GOING 25-30 MPH.  I WAS ON A CITY STREET.  MY BREAKS DID NOT STOP ME ON TIME. NEW BREAK PADS WERE JUST REPLACED. THE BREAKS JUST DIDN'T WORK RIGHT. TOOK TOO LONG TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP. I TESTED MY BREAKS ON MY OTHER CAR TO SEE IF THERE WAS ANY DIFFERENCE IN STOPPING AND I WOULD HAVE STOPPED IN MY OTHER CAR ON TIME.  BREAKS JUST TOOK TO LONG TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP ON THE NISSAN.
